name: jdnconvertiblecalendar
description: Conversions between various calendar formats and manipulations using Julian Day Number (JDN)

scripts.builddocs: typedoc --out docs --readme none --name 'JDNConvertibleCalendar API Documentation' --module commonjs src/*.ts

author: Tobias Schweizer <t.schweizer@unibas.ch>, DHLab University of Basel (http://www.dhlab.unibas.ch)
